TableSettings.uniqueName: IdeConnections%23DB+test.tds.ie+Visitor-dev%2C+Trunkselect cb.booking_reference from ca_booked_person cb where safe_get_setting_or_null('rfid_no_access') = 'Y' and cb.checked_out_date_time is null and cb.rejected_date_time is null and cb.cancellation_date_time is null and cb.checked_in_date_time is not null and ( cb.checked_in_date_time between ( svms_pak.now_to_ss_date(:cpID) - 24) and svms_pak.now_to_ss_date(:cpID) ) and cb.access_badge_number = :badge_number union all select p.booking_reference from ca_badge b, ca_booked_person cb, ca_person_interface p where safe_get_setting_or_null('rfid_no_access') = 'N' and cb.booking_reference = p.booking_reference and cb.checked_out_date_time is null and cb.rejected_date_time is null and cb.cancellation_date_time is null and cb.checked_in_date_time is not null and ( cb.checked_in_date_time between ( svms_pak.now_to_ss_date(:cpID) - 24) and svms_pak.now_to_ss_date(:cpID) ) and b.person_code = p.person_code and b.person_type = p.person_type and b.person_type = 'V' and b.status_ind = 'V' and b.badge_number = :badge_number
